name: ELECTROHOLIC
description:
A little robot tries to get away from a strange facility with its favourite battery, without which it can't leave for a long time. However, the robot has to use this battery to power different objects in the facility.

CONTROLS
  • W/A/S/D — movement;
  • E — Interact;
TEAM
  • Tricky Fat Cat — code, game design;
  • Sava T — music and sounds;
  • Grigorij "Syntheslav" Markov — music; (Congratulations on first jam!)
  • Ruslan Seferbekov — game design, level design;
  • Daniil Morozov — some 3D art; (Congratulations on first jam!)
  • Dmitriy Brusyanin — level design, game design; (Congratulations on first jam!)
  • Alevtina Smirnova — game design, some 2D art; (Congratulations on first jam!)
SPECIAL THANKS

KenneyNL for an amazing collection of free assets.
